name: Commander Pixman
description:
Retro action-platformer for the iOS! Fast-paced action, gun in your hands, 145 levels to master, hundreds of enemies to kill and thousands traps to avoid! Everything is packed with retro style and responsive controls!

Guide trapped Andrew "Pixman" Blazkowicz to leave the alien base. Destroy every creature, jump over treacherous holes and traps on his way. Find your rocket and get the hell out of there!

FEATURED AS "NEW & NOTEWORTHY", "WHAT'S HOT" in USA, Germany, Canada, Australia and other countries! Wonderful reviews on TouchArcade, TouchGen, AppSpy, PocketGamer, 148Apps! So many people can't be wrong.

Trailer: bit.ly/PixmanTrailer

WHAT YOU GET:
- 145 levels + MORE WITH UPDATES!
- Over 20 hazards, monsters and utilities
- Complete missions to unlock new levels!
- Watch replays of every game after finish!
- Universal game - play on your iPad and iPhone!
- External controllers support! iOS mFI controllers & iCade
- Game Center support with leaderboards and achievements.
- Scoring - get to the leaderboards from the first game!

If you want to try it first, check out "Commander Pixman - First Blood", free version of Commander Pixman.

www.one-minute-games.com
www.twitter.com/oneminutegames
